folder: Old Mill Road & Richmond Hill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Old Mill Road - Richmond Hill Road
text:

Old Mill Road, south side, at Richmond Hill Road, showing St. Andrews Protestant Episcopal Church, founded
in 1708 by Queen Anne.

Road.

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Mill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Mill Road
text:
Richmond Hill Road, north side, at the head of Mill Road, showing part of the old latourette farm. The property later became part of latourette Park.
bout 1910
By Mulford dimonson
Fiom P. L. Sperr Collection

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Old Mill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Old Mill Road
text:
Richmond Hill Road, east side, near Old Mill Road (vantage point). Shown is a view of Richmond Hill, looking northeastward, with the Staten Island Light (Ambrose Channel Light) appearing in the center
background.
About 1910
By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
(2)
Part of the same area, nearer the lighthouse.
About 1910
By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection

original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Mill Road
text:
Richmond Pill Road, west from near Mill Road, in Latourette Park. In the distance can be seen Arthur
Kiil.
December 18, 1913

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Mill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Mill Road
text:
Latourette Park (Staten IIsland): A view of the Datorette House, on the north side of Richmond Hill Road, at the head of Mill Road. This is the later lLatourette house; another house
stood farther south along Mill Road.
.March 5, 1922
By William T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date.
May 18, 1937
P. L. Sperr
(3)
Another view from a different angle.
June 20, 1937
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Old Mill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Old Mill Road
text:
Richmond Hill Road, east side, at Old Mill Road, showing the abandoned old Public School No. 28. It occupies the site of the whipping Post, removed in 18E5. A new S. S. 28 was erected at the S. W. corner of Center Street
Ad St. Patricks Place.
April 26, 1928
P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Hill Road & Old Mill Road, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Richmond Hill Road - Old Mill Road
text:
Richrond Hill Road, near Old Mill Road (vantage point. Shown is part of Richrond Hill in an autumn setting, in back of the old t. Andrews Church. View 2 shows a part of Richmond Hill, above the Staten Island (ighthouse, with mulberry trees appearing on
the left.
About 1D10
Views 1,2
By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
